name: queryReduce
syntax: queryReduce(query, function(result, row [, currentRow] [, query]){} [, initialVal])
description: Reduces query columns just like in array or collection

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: The result of the reduce operation after the previous iteration
callback_params.name: result

callback_params.description: A struct with all of the columns for the current iteration
callback_params.name: row

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: currentRow

callback_params.description: A reference of the original query
callback_params.name: query

params.name: initialValue
params.description: initial value passed as part of the first closure call
